channel.title: [FIXED] Cook's Assistant Player Save
channel.description:
I just successfully added the cooks assistant quest from scratch. It works excellently other than the fact that once the server is restarted, the player can complete the quest again. I added into the PlayerSave.java to write the progress in cooks assistant. The result was some messed up things. First, I put the write code for the quest under the write code for the username and I ended up not being able to log in. Then i put it under the quest points and I logged on naked with nothing in my inventory with all level one stats and a skull over my head, and i was still able to complete cooks assistant even though i had done it... Now it occurred to me that I need a bit of code to READ the text file to see what the progress in the quest is. Problem is I do not know where it is located. [RUNESOURCE]
Please if anyone knows please post where it is located and / or how to fix this.

item.title: [FIXED] Cook's Assistant Player Save
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Nope, report the first post to a mod asking for a lock.

Read full topic
